name: SUPER ROLL
description:
SUPER ROLL - Disclaimer: Not Affiliated with Capcom

Controls:

XBOX 360  CONTROLLER:

D-Pad, A BUTTON, X BUTTON, B BUTTON, START, SELECT, SHOULDER BUTTONS

KEYBOARD:

Arrow Keys, X, C, V, S, D, M, SPACE BAR

Roll can Charge and Slide. 

Shoulder Buttons/S,D will swap weapons out without needing to Pause. 

Hitting Select/M while Paused will exit the current stage. 

B Button/V are the Slide Buttons if you don't want to hit Down + A Button/X.

FAQ:

Q: Hey this game seems kinda unpolished and there's no customization controls???

A: I'm sorry, I am tired and exhausted and ran out of time.

Q: Any chance of having this playable on anything but Windows?

A: Sorry, not really...
